name: Iron Golem
description: A massive, humanoid construct made entirely of iron, standing over 12 feet tall, with an impervious iron body.
memorable: Extremely durable with immunity to most damage types and can heal from fire damage.
goals: Typically serves as a guardian for treasures, vaults, or important relics.
relations: Often employed by wizards, sorcerers, or malicious entities.
environment: Usually found in treasure vaults, fortresses, or locations of importance.
strengths: Immunity to poison, psychic damage, and physical damage from non-magical attacks, with high hit points.
weaknesses: Low dexterity and intelligence make it predictable in battle.
attacks: Can perform multiple melee attacks with massive weapons, delivering significant bludgeoning and piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Releases poisonous gas in a 15-foot radius, dealing considerable damage to nearby foes.
skills: Average perception allows it to notice threats.
additional_information: Functions without the need for air, food, drink, or sleep.
Immune to exhaustion and several debilitating conditions.
Can heal by absorbing fire damage.
Attacks are considered magical, avoiding standard defenses.
Has a multiattack capability with both spear arm and shield bash.
test_queries: massive iron guardian with poison attacks
indestructible construct that heals from fire
slow but powerful iron protector with gas attack
golem that serves wizards and sorcerers
